title: Smirnov-type integral formulae for correlation functions of the bulk/boundary XXZ model in the anti-ferromagnetic regime
abstract: Presented are the integral solutions to the quantum Knizhnik-Zamolodchikov equations for the correlation functions of both the bulk and boundary XXZ models in the anti-ferromagnetic regime. The difference equations can be derived from Smirnov-type master equations for correlation functions on the basis of the CTM bootstrap. Our integral solutions with an appropriate choice of the integral kernel reproduce the formulae previously obtained by using the bosonization of the vertex operators of the quantum affine algebra $U_q (\hat{\mathfrak{sl}_2})$.
